sent.orig: Cut them into cubes on next morning. Store a air-tight container and keep them in fridge.
sent.trans: 第二天早上，取出并切成块，放入密封盒中，放回冰箱保存。

sent.orig: One should take good care of his spleen, and stomach to avoid fridge syndrome.
sent.trans: 为了防止冰箱病，必须平时就注意保养脾胃。

sent.orig: King put the salmon back into the fridge and then took it out again.
sent.trans: 金先生把鱼放回到冰箱，然后又把它那鱼拿出来。

sent.orig: You ordered a new cooker, fridge and washing machine? You really went to town!
sent.trans: 你订购了新的厨灶、冰箱和洗衣机了吗？你真是大手大脚了。

sent.orig: There's some ice in the fridge.
